import React, { useState } from 'react' import Slider from "react-slick" import Link from "next/link" import ReactHtmlParser from 'react-html-parser' const Slideshow = (props) => { console.log(props) const settings = { dots: false, infinite: true, speed: 500, slidesToShow: 1, slidesToScroll: 1 } return (
{props.data.map((item, index) => { const img = item.object_img.length>2 ? JSON.parse(item.object_img)[0] : '' return

{item.tipo_servicio}

{ReactHtmlParser(item.object_titulo)}

{item.descripcion}

{item.button_name}
})}
) } export default Slideshow
